question.title: What is the primary function of the lateral rectus muscle in the eye?
question.description: The lateral rectus muscle is responsible for which of the following?

option_a.title: To adduct the eye
option_a.description: This option is related to moving the eye inward

option_b.title: To abduct the eye
option_b.description: This option is related to moving the eye outward

option_c.title: To control pupil size
option_c.description: This option is related to the constriction or dilation of the pupil

option_d.title: To regulate eye movement in the sagittal plane
option_d.description: This option is related to the movement of the eye in a front-to-back direction

correct_option.title: B
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
